title: (x) Looking for Accident font - Accident Grotesque (Ouch) {Dav}
content:
Hey fellas

Dos anyone know about a font called Accident. Either for PC or MAC...

Txs

Mark
author: TheMark

comments.content:
If you are looking for ' [Accident _( Grotesque )_](http://web.archive.org/web/20100430131307/http:/www.typ.nl/TYP01/info_and_opi/accident/accident01.html)', by Joachim Mueller-Lance, that one seems to have been renamed to / rereleased as ' [Ouch](http://web.archive.org/web/20100430131307/http:/store.adobe.com/type/browser/F/OUCQ/F_OUCQ-10005000.html)', and should be available from Adobe..

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100430131307/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Formlos...

The stories are true - you are amazing

Thx,,, Mark
Amazing he is indeed. That font on the other hand... ouch! :^)

Thank you, Thank you..  
_( Wait, There are stories about me.? :)_

Dav, [formlos](http://web.archive.org/web/20100430131307/http:/www.formlos.net/)

Gee, I wonder why he had to change the name? Hmmm.

ChrisL
